page.title: Sun Capital, TDR Buy HHG Units for 1.03 Bln Pounds (Update3)
page.text: Sun Capital Partners Inc. and TDR Capital LLP, private equity buyout firms, agreed to pay 1.03 billion pounds (\$1.98 billion) for HHG Plc #39;s UK-based life insurance units, their first investment in the industry.
